VIDEO_UPLOAD_WARNING: Uploading videos may take some time...
CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete?
ABOUT_TEXT1: This software is developed in Caravan Next - a Social Community Theatre collaborative project co-funded by the Creative Europe Programme of the European Union.
ABOUT_TEXT2: The project connects professional artists with communities and local citizens through theatre events and cultural activities in 16 European countries from September 2015 till February 2019.
STATEMENT_PROMPT: My suggestion on how to "Feed the Future"
STATEMENT_HELP: Give your own statement on how to feed the future... Your motto for a better future...
NEW_POST_PROMPT: Share your memories of this event...
NO_NOTIFICATIONS_YET: There are no notifications to see...
NO_POSTS_OFFLINE: Come online to see what other people say...
REPORT_POST_PROMPT: Please tell us what's wrong with this post...
REPORT_COMMENT_PROMPT: Please tell us what's wrong with this comment...
CONFIRM_BLOCK:
You are about to block user {{userName}}. This means that you will stop seeing content uploaded by this user.
Are you sure?
GMAPS_LOAD_ERROR: Could not load Google Maps at the moment. Please check your internet connection and try again...
INVITATION_MSG: Download the cNext app now, and join the Caravan Next community!
SEE_NEW_POSTS_NOW: There are new posts that you have not seen. Would you like to see them now?

EVT_2CAL_SUCCESS.TITLE: Success
EVT_2CAL_SUCCESS.BODY:
The event has been added to your Personal Calendar with basic info and two reminders!
You can Edit this Event in your Calendar app as any other Event.

EVT_2CAL_FAILURE.TITLE: Ooops...
EVT_2CAL_FAILURE.BODY:
The event could not be added to your Personal Calendar.
Please make sure that you have granted the appropriate permissions.

CAL_OPEN_FAILURE.TITLE: Ooops...
CAL_OPEN_FAILURE.BODY:
The Calendar App could not be launched.
Please make sure that you have granted the appropriate permissions.

DSCLMR_DECLINED.TITLE: Welcome
DSCLMR_DECLINED.BODY:
Welcome to Caravan Next Community! Unfortunately, you cannot share share your own memories with all of us until you accept our terms and conditions.
You can still accept them when trying to post some content.

DSCLMR_ACCEPTED.TITLE: Welcome
DSCLMR_ACCEPTED.BODY:
Welcome to Caravan Next Community! You can now share your own memories with all of us.
Enjoy...

LOGIN_ERROR.TITLE: Login Error
LOGIN_ERROR.BODY:
Your login to Caravan Next was not possible.
Please try again later...

SIGNUP_ERROR.TITLE: Registration Error
SIGNUP_ERROR.BODY:
Your Registration to Caravan Next was not possible.
Please try again later...
